descriptionlist.description: Wallpaper Roller is a Xen HTML background that will rotate a set of images on a regular basis. You can use JPEG, PNG and even GIF and MP4 files, or use any compatible Danbooru website to pull images from the internet.

1. Install WallpaperRoller;
2. Put your images or MP4 videos into /var/mobile/Library/WR_Pictures;
3. Reinstall WallpaperRoller to update the image list;
4. Add Wallpaper Roller as a background in Xen HTML settings;
5. Enable persistent mode by going into Xen HTML lockscreen settings -> Advanced -> Turn on Persistent Mode;
6. If desired, configure the additional settings.

Change Interval: in minutes, how often to refresh the wallpaper. Updates only happen when the wallpaper becomes visible.
Shake sensitivity: shake the device to immediately change the wallpaper. Smaller number: higher sensitivity.
Enable online images: enable pulling images from a Danbooru API like e926.net
Connection check URL: enter IP:PORT of any local WiFi device with a webserver, for example a router at 192.168.1.1:80. This will disable online images when not on WiFi. Leave blank to only use online images.
Online API URL: Danbooru API url to poll. Must return data in the following format: {posts: [tags: ["cute", "sfw"], file: [url: "https://..."]]}
Blacklisted tags: remove posts that have these tags. Must be comma separated, no spaces.
